name: com.unity.remote-config-runtime

_upm.changelog:
- Updated `com.unity.services.core` dependency from `1.3.2` to `1.4.0`
- Added 2.x namespace and corresponding API's for backward compatibility with 2.x implementation
- Promote Candidate Experimental package to Verified Production

description: Remote Config is a cloud service that lets you tune and customize your app over the air without requiring an update to your game.  This package is intended to be inherited as a dependency, and should not be directly installed, by end users. Unity Developers that want to implement Unity Remote Config in their game/application, should use the Remote Config Package `com.unity.remote-config` rather than this package directly.

samples.description: This sample example C# file can be used to quickly utilise usage of Remote Config APIs. For more comprehensive code integration, visit https://docs.unity3d.com/Packages/com.unity.remote-config@latest
